message.raw:
Started the Qt port.
main.pyw is now very minamilistic
The queue manager is being moved into a class within queue.py
New UI file (incomplete) is also added.

At this stage you can add files to the queue, and reorder them.
Also done some nice linking between buttons and instance variables using @property (it would be even nicer if I can work out how to connect a Qt signal into a @property setter without an intermediary function)

message:
Started the Qt port.
main.pyw is now very minamilistic
The queue manager is being moved into a class within queue.py
New UI file (incomplete) is also added.

At this stage you can add files to the queue, and reorder them.
Also done some nice linking between buttons and instance variables using @property (it would be even nicer if I can work out how to connect a Qt signal into a @property setter without an intermediary function)
